name: An Artificial Story About Embodiment
description:
An Artificial Story About Embodiment

An recursive, interactive story created by AI with the prompt of "Embodiment".  Created by Wayne Huras for CART 345 - Digital Texts and Typography, Concordia University, Fall 2021.

Credits:

Text generation: https://inferkit.com/docs/generation

Music: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/crowander

Sound effects: https://freesound.org/people/Speedenza/sounds/167842/, https://freesound.org/people/SkyernAklea/sounds/436551/
